Reliable Surveillance Solutions

Analog Cameras

High-quality analog surveillance cameras with reliable performance and cost-effective solutions

UAC-B115-AF28(40)-W

5MP ColorHunter Fixed Warm Light Bullet Analog Camera with high quality imaging and 24/7 color capabilities

Key Features:

  • 5MP high quality image
  • TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS multi-format support
  • White light illumination for 24/7 color images

UAC-B115-AF28(40)

5MP Fixed IR Bullet Analog Camera with built-in microphone, IP67 protection, and multi-format video output support

Key Features:

  • 5MP high quality image TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS
  • IR-cut filter with auto-switch (ICR)
  • 180° horizontal flip, 180° vertical flip

UAC-B142-AF28(40)LM-DL

2MP ColorHunter Fixed Dual-light Bullet Analog Camera with high quality imaging, smart dual light capability, and IP67 protection

Key Features:

  • High quality imaging with 2MP resolution
  • TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS support
  • IR-cut filter with auto-switch (ICR)

UAC-B145-AF28(40)LM-DL

5MP ColorHunter Fixed Dual-light Bullet Analog Camera with high quality imaging, smart dual light capability, and IP67 protection

Key Features:

  • High quality imaging with 5MP resolution
  • TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS support
  • IR-cut filter with auto-switch (ICR)

UAC-T115-AF28(40)-W

5MP ColorHunter Fixed Warm Light Turret Analog Camera with high quality imaging, multiple video format support, and white light illumination for 24/7 color images

Key Features:

  • 5MP high quality image
  • TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS support
  • White light illumination for 24/7 color images

UAC-T142-AF28(40)LM-DL

2MP ColorHunter Fixed Dual-light Turret Analog Camera with high quality imaging and smart dual light technology

Key Features:

  • High quality imaging with 2MP resolution
  • TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS support
  • IR-cut filter with auto-switch (ICR)
